teaser: Inflation, Apple's e-book woes, and a look at the state of the Argentine economy
title: PODCAST: The state of the Argentine economy
contentencoded: First up, Juli Niemann, analyist at Smith, Moore and Company, stops by to talk inflation. Plus, more on Apple's settlement in its suit over e-books. Last up, Russell Padmore of the BBC, talks about the current state of Argentina's economy in light of the U.S. court ruling regarding the country's payments to creditors.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday June 17, 2014
description: Inflation, Apple's e-book woes, and a look at the state of the Argentine economy
